quote: Yeah, it always amazes me how quickly people turn into good little socialists when they run out of their stuff. As long as they have something, it's theirs. Let them run out, and you need to share.
quote_letters: YEAH IT ALWAYS AMAZES ME HOW QUICKLY PEOPLE TURN INTO GOOD LITTLE SOCIALISTS WHEN THEY RUN OUT OF THEIR STUFF AS LONG AS THEY HAVE SOMETHING ITS THEIRS LET THEM RUN OUT AND YOU NEED TO SHARE
